name: Theneo
headline: Stripe-like API Docs in just a few clicks
description: Next-Gen API Documentation with AI Brilliance. Generate Stripe-like API docs in just a few seconds.
generated_description:
**Theneo: Revolutionizing API Documentation with AI**

Founded in 2022 and nestled in the tech hub of San Francisco, Theneo is part of Y Combinator's W22 batch, and it’s grabbing attention for all the right reasons. The company aims to simplify the creation of API documentation, offering a Stripe-like API documentation experience in just a few clicks. In an age where developers often juggle multiple responsibilities, having a slick and efficient way to generate documentation can save precious time.

### What’s Going On?

Theneo is harnessing the power of artificial intelligence to create stunning API docs that don’t just look good but are also easy to maintain. With a dedicated team of 21 talented individuals, they’ve already attracted over 10,000 companies who are keen to streamline their API documentation processes. This is a clear indication that there’s a robust demand for their product.

### Core Features

Theneo's platform is designed to be intuitive, allowing users to create API documentation by simply uploading their API specs. The key features include:
- **AI-Powered Documentation:** Using AI, users can generate rich, low-maintenance documentation in seconds. This helps developers focus on coding rather than on writing docs.
- **Interactive API Testing:** Users can test their APIs in both production and sandbox environments, adding a layer of confidence in functionality.
- **Live Collaboration:** Teams can edit, review, and comment in real-time, fostering better communication and a more integrated workflow.
- **Automated Changelogs:** Keep track of changes effortlessly with automatic release notes and notifications, ensuring everyone is up to date.
- **Branded Documentation Portals:** Customize your docs to align with your brand—turn your documentation into an extension of your website.

### The Path Forward

Theneo is not just creating tools; they're reshaping the experience of interacting with APIs. Their focus on reducing the friction in documentation will likely drive API usage up to threefold for many organizations. 

For developers looking to ease their workload, Theneo offers everything from an API reference, developer portal, to tools that integrate seamlessly with popular platforms like GitHub and Visual Studio Code. Their agile approach means they are continuously expanding their offerings, with other exciting tools on the horizon.

If you’re curious about transforming your API management or simply want to see how they work, check out their website [Theneo.io](https://theneo.io) and sign up for a demo or join for free. You’ll be stepping into a future where API documentation is as effortless as a few clicks and commands.
